public final class SyncingLNS extends Object

    • NODE_ENTITY_PARENT

      public static final alexiil.mc.lib.net.ParentNetIdSingle<NodeEntity> NODE_ENTITY_PARENT
      Net parent for all node entities.

      This allows node entities to send packets between server-side node entity and client-side node entity.

    • LINK_ENTITY_PARENT

      public static final alexiil.mc.lib.net.ParentNetIdSingle<LinkEntity> LINK_ENTITY_PARENT
      Net parent for all link entities.

      This allows link entities to send packets between server-side link entity and client-side link entity.

    • GRAPH_ENTITY_PARENT

      public static final alexiil.mc.lib.net.ParentNetIdSingle<GraphEntity> GRAPH_ENTITY_PARENT
      Net parent for all graph entities.

      This allows graph entities to send packets between server-side graph entity and client-side graph entity.

    • decodeNodePos

      @NotNull public static @NotNull NodePos decodeNodePos(@NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.NetByteBuf buf, @NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.IMsgReadCtx ctx, @NotNull @NotNull LNSSyncedUniverse universe) throws alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException
      Decodes a NodePos from a packet.
      Parameters:
      buf - the buffer to read from.
      ctx - the packet's message context.
      universe - the universe that the block node's decoder is to be retrieved from.
      Returns:
      a newly decoded NodePos.
      Throws:
      alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException - if there was an error while decoding the node pos.

    • decodeLinkPos

      @NotNull public static @NotNull LinkPos decodeLinkPos(@NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.NetByteBuf buf, @NotNull @NotNull alexiil.mc.lib.net.IMsgReadCtx ctx, @NotNull @NotNull LNSSyncedUniverse universe) throws alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException
      Decodes a link pos from a packet.
      Parameters:
      buf - the buffer to read from.
      ctx - the message context.
      universe - the universe containing the decoders that this will use.
      Returns:
      a newly decoded link pos, or null if decoding failed.
      Throws:
      alexiil.mc.lib.net.InvalidInputDataException - if there was an error while decoding the link pos.
